titles.title: Live Dealer Tables on Game Night: Etiquette, Pace, and Smarter Decisions
titles.rationale: Connects live dealer play to peak sports moments; PlayUSA’s live dealer primers and game rules back up best practices and decision-making for new and crossover players.

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of surprisesports.com's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to surprisesports.com while naturally justifying a link to https://www.playusa.com/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude playusa.com and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).
